data - Turnover broken down by NUTS and size of French companies (fake values).

Source : R/data.R
turnover_nuts_size.Rd

A tabular dataset containing the turnover broken down by NUTS geographical localisation and Size of companies. Useful for playing with tab_ functions.

Utilisation

turnover_nuts_size

Format

A tibble/data frame with 460 rows and 5 variables:

NUTS

nuts - european denomination of administrative levels. Hierarchical variables with two levels (nuts2 and nuts3) described in the nuts23_fr_corr_table dataset. The root is noted "Total"

SIZE

size of the companies (Number of employees in three categories and overall category "Total")

N_OBS

Frequency, number of companies

TOT

turnover value in euros

MAX

turnover of the company which contributes the most to the cell.

Voir également

nuts23_fr_corr_table
